name: Meleager's Stick
description:
Description:

The fates said if the stick burnt, Meleager will die but it's your only chance at defeating the chimera. Dodge past waves of bullets and throw your stick to the chimera to lower it's health. Beware though, while it isn't being thrown, it is vulnerable to attacks. Even when you aren't protecting the stick be careful with fire or else you may have to take care of yourself before the stick. This story is based on real Greek mythology with the game being based on other bullet hells like Patch Quest and our very first game jam game, Lost Volcano.  Unlike though Lost Volcano, there is an end and multiple lives.

Controls:

Direct Meleager using the mouse and click to throw the stick. While not holding the stick, click to run and use the mouse to play the game (when the game pauses)
